Topics.MainKnText: clear|strict|more|reflection|resolve|turn|down|offer|attentive
Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you are required to complete each question by deciding on the most appropriate word or words from the 4 choices marked A, B, C and D.

Queses.QuesAsk: On more ____ reflection, I resolved to turn down the offer.

Topics.MainKnText: peasant|land|复数名词 + 复数谓语 + (...)
Topics.ImporKnText: deprive|一般过去时的被动语态: was/were + 过去分词 + (by + 名词/代词)
Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you are required to complete each question by deciding on the most appropriate word or words from the 4 choices marked A, B, C and D.

Queses.QuesAsk: The peasants ____ their land.

Topics.MainKnText: unaccountable|unidentified|America|burst|growth|prosperity|after|have|social|consequence|that|anywhere|in the world|world|(...) + 名词/代词表示人或物 + that + 谓语 + (...)|unremarkable|一般过去时[be动词]: was/were
Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you are required to complete each question by deciding on the most appropriate word or words from the 4 choices marked A, B, C and D.

Queses.QuesAsk: The burst of growth and prosperity in America after 1945 had social consequences that were ____ anywhere in the world.
Queses.QuesAnalysis: A选项：unprecedented的意思为"前所未有的"，如：The air crash caused an unprecedented number  of deaths.(这次空难的死亡人数是空前的。)句意：1945年以后，美国的急剧发展和繁荣产生了全世界前所未有的社会效果。故选A。其他三项意思分别是：unidentified不能辨认的，身份不明的；unaccountable不负责任的，不能理解的；unremarkable寻常的，不值得注意的。

Topics.MainKnText: exhibit|persuade|decline|mild|weather|have|sale|winter|clothing|单数名词/不可数名词 + 单数谓语 + (...)
Topics.ImporKnText: inhibit|现在完成时: have/has + 过去分词
Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you are required to complete each question by deciding on the most appropriate word or words from the 4 choices marked A, B, C and D.

Queses.QuesAsk: The mild weather has ____ the sales of winter clothing.

Topics.MainKnText: America|inspection|discrete|autonomous|solemn|have|now|more|European|style|system|incidence|food|poison|fall|现在完成时: have/has + 过去分词|单数名词/不可数名词 + 单数谓语 + (...)|现在进行时: am/is/are + 现在分词
Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you are required to complete each question by deciding on the most appropriate word or words from the 4 choices marked A, B, C and D.

Queses.QuesAsk: America has now adopted more ____ European style inspection systems, and the incidence of food poisoning is falling.

Topics.MainKnText: come between|minimal|partial|slight|let|such|matter|as|this|come|between|that|can|concentrate (...) on|concentrate|major|issue|so (...) that|主句 + so that + 从句主语 + 情态动词 + 动词原形 + (...)
Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you are required to complete each question by deciding on the most appropriate word or words from the 4 choices marked A, B, C and D.

Queses.QuesAsk: Don't let such a ____ matter as this come between us so that we can concentrate on the major issue.

Topics.MainKnText: rapt|rare|cautious|usually|thing|little|care|单数名词/不可数名词 + 单数谓语 + (...)
Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you are required to complete each question by deciding on the most appropriate word or words from the 4 choices marked A, B, C and D.

Queses.QuesAsk: Mary usually does things with little care, she is ____.

Topics.MainKnText: America|strife|China|drive|drift|accept|challenge|strengthen|tie|that|bind|co-operate|great|prosperity|among|our|people|more|secure|just|peace|in the world|world|(...) + 名词/代词表示人或物 + that + 谓语 + (...)
Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you are required to complete each question by deciding on the most appropriate word or words from the 4 choices marked A, B, C and D.

Queses.QuesAsk: America and China accepted the challenge to strengthen the ties that bind us, to cooperate for greater prosperity among our people, and to ____ for a more secure and just peace in the world.

Topics.MainKnText: project|campaign|investment|tourism|chief|that|country|一般现在时[be动词]: am/is/are
Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you are required to complete each question by deciding on the most appropriate word or words from the 4 choices marked A, B, C and D.

Queses.QuesAsk: Watch-making and tourism are the chief ____ of that country.
Queses.QuesAnalysis: 考查名词辨析。projects 项目，工程，企划；campaigns 运动；enterprises [经] 企业；investments 投资。句意：钟表制造和旅游业是那个国家的主要企业。故选C。

Topics.MainKnText: well|have|grow|say|really|change|your|hair|give (...) up|give|up|drink|know|three|kid|now|moustache|现在完成时: have/has + 过去分词|一般过去时[实义动词]: 动词过去式|一般现在时[实义动词]: 动词原形/动词第三人称单数
Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you are required to complete each question by deciding on the most appropriate word or words from the 4 choices marked A, B, C and D.

Queses.QuesAsk:
-You know, I have three kids now.

-____
OptionContentList: Say, you've really changed your hair.

Topics.MainKnText: surgeon|disease|leg|cut|out|from|girl|一般过去时[实义动词]: 动词过去式
Topics.TopicPintro: Complete the following sentences with appropriate words or phrases. Change the form when necessary.

Queses.QuesAsk: The surgeon cut the diseased ____ (t-) out from the girl's leg.
Queses.QuesAnalysis: 句意：外科医生把生病的组织从女孩的腿上切了下来，所以用tissue，表示组织。

Topics.MainKnText: have|education|school
Topics.TopicPintro: Complete the following sentences with appropriate words or phrases. Change the form when necessary.

Queses.QuesAsk: In the school, we have ____ education (义务的）.
Queses.QuesAnalysis: 该空修饰名词education，用形容词，所以填compulsory。

Topics.MainKnText: boy|better|read|than|sport|(...) + 名词 + than + 从句其他部分
Topics.TopicPintro: Complete the following sentences with appropriate words or phrases. Change the form when necessary.

Queses.QuesAsk: John isn't an ____ (擅长运动的) boy; he is better at reading than doing sports.
Queses.QuesAnalysis: 考查形容词。句意：John并不是一个擅长运动的男孩，比起运动，他更擅长阅读。形容词athletic擅长运动的，该词在句中做定语修饰boy，所以要填athletic。

Topics.MainKnText: fall on/upon|happen to|day|happen|fall|wife|death|一般过去时[实义动词]: 动词过去式
Topics.TopicPintro: Complete the following sentences with appropriate words or phrases. Change the form when necessary.

Queses.QuesAsk: The day happened to fall on the ____ (周年纪念日) of his wife's death.
Queses.QuesAnalysis: 句意：那天恰巧是他妻子去世周年纪念日。the anniversary of… 意为…的周年纪念日，故答案是anniversary。

Topics.MainKnText: want|control|own|in control of
Topics.TopicPintro: Complete the following sentences with appropriate words or phrases. Change the form when necessary.

Queses.QuesAsk: He wants to be in control of his own ____ (命运).

Topics.MainKnText: have|menu|from time to time|现在完成进行时: have/has been + 现在分词|this|restaurant|change|from|time|单数名词/不可数名词 + 单数谓语 + (...)
Topics.TopicPintro: Complete the following sentences with appropriate words or phrases. Change the form when necessary.

Queses.QuesAsk: This restaurant has been changing menus from time to time to ____ (迎合) the customers'tastes.
Queses.QuesAnalysis: 句意：这家餐馆不时更新菜单以迎合顾客的胃口。根据句子结构可知，此处应填动词短语：迎合 cater to/cater for。

Topics.MainKnText: sincerity|主语 + 谓语 + what + 从句|about|always|mean|what|say|一般现在时[实义动词]: 动词原形/动词第三人称单数
Topics.TopicPintro: Complete the following sentences with appropriate words or phrases. Change the form when necessary.

Queses.QuesAsk: Don't be ____ (s-) about his sincerity; he always means what he says.
Queses.QuesAnalysis: 短语be skeptical/ skeptical about对 ... 怀疑；句意：不要对他的诚实表示怀疑，他总是说话算话。

Topics.MainKnText: pregnant|elderly|child|woman|people|who|ill|particularly|when|disaster|strike|(...) + 名词/代词表示人 + who + 谓语 + (...)
Topics.TopicPintro: Complete the following sentences with appropriate words or phrases. Change the form when necessary.

Queses.QuesAsk: Children, pregnant women, elderly people, malnourished people, and people who are ill are particularly ____ (v-) when a disaster strikes.
Queses.QuesAnalysis: 当灾难发生时，孩子、孕妇、老人、营养不良的人和生病的人特别容易受到伤害。所以填vulnerable。

Topics.MainKnText: vaccine|can|treat|bird|flu
Topics.ImporKnText: 被动语态[含情态动词]: 主语 + 情态动词 + be + 过去分词 + (by + 名词/代词)|infect
Topics.TopicPintro: Complete the following sentences with appropriate words or phrases. Change the form when necessary.

Queses.QuesAsk: Treated with a vaccine, you can't be ____ (感染) with bird flu.
Queses.QuesAnalysis: 考查过去分词。句意：接种疫苗，你就不会感染禽流感。此处是情态动词的被动，结构是情态动词+be+动词过去分词，故填infected.

Topics.MainKnText: as|have|contract|disease|immediately|send|hospital|主句(,) as + 从句|contagious|一般过去时的被动语态: was/were + 过去分词 + (by + 名词/代词)|过去完成时: had + 过去分词
Topics.TopicPintro: Complete the following sentences with appropriate words or phrases. Change the form when necessary.

Queses.QuesAsk: As he had contracted (感染) a contagious (传染的) disease, he was immediately sent to a (n) ____ (isolate) hospital.

Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you will hear eight short conversations. At the end of each conversation, one or more questions will be asked about what was said. Both the conversation and the questions will be spoken only once. After each question there will be a pause. During the pause, you must read the four choices marked A, B, C, and D and decide which is the best answer.
Topics.TopicArticle:
W: Your resume is perfect. Now I want to know your opinion about overtime work.

M: Overtime work is very common in companies. I can work overtime if necessary, but I don't think we will work overtime every day.

Q: What is the man most probably doing?

Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you will hear eight short conversations. At the end of each conversation, one or more questions will be asked about what was said. Both the conversation and the questions will be spoken only once. After each question there will be a pause. During the pause, you must read the four choices marked A, B, C, and D and decide which is the best answer.
Topics.TopicArticle:
M: Can you tell me the title of this oil painting?

W: Sorry, I don't know for sure, but I guess it's an early 18th century work. Let me look it up in the catalog.

Q: Where does their conversation most probably take place?

Topics.MainKnText: make ends meet
Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you will hear eight short conversations. At the end of each conversation, one or more questions will be asked about what was said. Both the conversation and the questions will be spoken only once. After each question there will be a pause. During the pause, you must read the four choices marked A, B, C, and D and decide which is the best answer.
Topics.TopicArticle:
W: Do you know that Mark turned down that job offered by a travel agency?

M: Yeah. The hours were convenient, but he wouldn't have been able to make ends meet.

Q: Why does Mark refuse to take the job?

OptionContentList: Because the working hours were not suitable.
Because the job was not well paid.
Because he had to do a lot of traveling.
Because the job was quite difficult.

Topics.MainKnText: What + 情态动词或助动词[或否定形式] + 主语 + 动词?
Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you will hear eight short conversations. At the end of each conversation, one or more questions will be asked about what was said. Both the conversation and the questions will be spoken only once. After each question there will be a pause. During the pause, you must read the four choices marked A, B, C, and D and decide which is the best answer.
Topics.TopicArticle:
M: I wonder whether the English examination paper is even more difficult this time.

W: I'm afraid more students will fail in it.

Queses.QuesAsk: What does the woman think of the examination paper?

Topics.MainKnText: what|woman|一般现在时[be动词]: am/is/are|What + be动词[或否定形式] + 主语?
Topics.TopicPintro: In this section, you will hear eight short conversations. At the end of each conversation, one or more questions will be asked about what was said. Both the conversation and the questions will be spoken only once. After each question there will be a pause. During the pause, you must read the four choices marked A, B, C, and D and decide which is the best answer.

Queses.QuesAsk: What is the woman unsatisfied with?
